workspace.descr: You can combine any configuration of output size, output format, compression strength, etc., and switch them freely.

local.descr: No data will be uploaded, so you don't have to worry about your photos being leaked.

free.descr: All people and businesses can use this software for free, and the source code is open.

showcase.title: High Compression Ratio
showcase.content: In the example, the original image is on the left and the compressed image is on the right. You can drag the slider and it is hard to see any difference.

meta.title: PixZip Lite - Compress images quickly & free!
